column4: hey folks, i had to turn off my laptop because ubuntu hung (what ya meant to when that happens?) now when it boots up the menus and icons vanish just after i log in and no keyboard actions seem to do anythign
anyone got any fixes for this?
someone must have seen this problem
seems common enough
how does seem common to you?
happened to me on another laptop and i had to reinstall!
go away pls
this kin of smells like a wrong diver problem to me...
you are talking about a completely fresh install or how was that?
well there aint any...
oops meant ctrl + alt + f2 of course
just a sec im trying out sth
reboot please ut do not log in!
what ?
which is basically what it should do and btw dos -  no such thing;)
do not login graphically butwhen you see the login prompt switch to some console
so at the login prompt do ctrl alt f2?
exactly
lspci whats it say?
lspci says that??
Schypher_ i have a client im sorry..
